sum.title: Sum
sum.description: Total of all line item amounts.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Total of all discounts applied at the document level.

charge.title: Charge
charge.description: Total of all charges applied at the document level.

tax_included.title: Tax Included
tax_included.description: Total tax amount included in the prices, if prices are tax-inclusive.

total.title: Total
total.description: Net total amount after subtracting discounts and adding charges, excluding tax.

taxes.title: Tax Totals
taxes.description: Detailed breakdown of all taxes applied to the invoice.

tax.title: Tax
tax.description: Total indirect tax amount to be applied to the invoice.

total_with_tax.title: Total with Tax
total_with_tax.description: Final total amount after applying indirect taxes.

retained_tax.title: Retained Tax
retained_tax.description: Total tax amount retained or withheld by the customer to be paid to the tax authority.

rounding.title: Rounding
rounding.description: Adjustment amount applied to the invoice totals to meet rounding rules or expectations.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description: Final amount to be paid after retained taxes and rounding adjustments.

advance.title: Advance
advance.description: Total amount already paid in advance by the customer.

due.title: Due
due.description: Remaining amount that needs to be paid.

Totals.description: Totals contains the summaries of all calculations for the invoice.
